Reviews.Title: Nice sleek look but sound dies in days
Reviews.Author: gach "misc buyer"
Reviews.Content: It looked great but the sound (both internal, ring tone & speaker) all died within a week. Had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone as a first smartphone, value for money and good performance
Reviews.Author: lloyd
Reviews.Content: love the phone it is worth the money, it comes with Froyo installed but i have installed a custom rom from tonyp , cynogenmod and am on ICS now. Great buy and love it.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: ALCIDES FERNANDEZ
Reviews.Content: GREAT TEAM THAT MEETS MY NEEDS. OWN GOOD STYLE AND LINE. SEEING MANY PEOPLE LOVES PHONE IS REALLY VERY NICE
